author: Aaron Weaver
title: You’ll Need a Vaccine to Survive Pitbull’s Coronavirus ‘World Anthem’
description: Pitbull just released a new 'world anthem' about the coronavirus and it's nearly as bad as the disease itself. The lack of originality in his lyrics would make any high school writing teacher cringe. The post You’ll Need a Vaccine to Survive Pitbull’s Coronav…
content:
• Rapper Pitbull just released a new song about the coronavirus crisis.
  • Hes calling it a world anthem.
  • The world is in much worse shape than we thought if this cringe-worthy song is our anthem.
Leave it to Pitbull to create the … [+2998 chars]
